Publishing checklist

- Update version in package.json
- Ensure build artifacts are up-to-date: `npm run build`
- Run tests: `npm test`
- Run lint and format: `npm run lint` && `npm run format`
- Publish: `npm publish --access public` (if scoped package, ensure access is set)

Published on: 2025-12-16T15:32:16.895Z
